name: CodeNxt Technologies
tag_list: wpm2-0, web-presence-management, open-source, web-design, web-development, india, start-up, properties-search
overview:
CodeNxt Technologies is a partnership firm based in India. CodeNxt consults in Web Presence Management with their campaign product WPM 2.0 . The product helps a local businesses reach their customers through various online channels like social networks, searches & listings, though it is not essentially SEO & does not help in generating hits on the website.

As part of the WPM 2.0 product, CodeNxt may get involved either end to end or at any of the selected stages of the process of setting up a website, designing , getting people or end customers use the website & utilizing the analytics to further inprove the campaign. CodeNxt WPM 2.0 focuses more on long term brand recall instead of hit generation & online sales.

The company prefers open source & internally uses only open sourced technologies as a policy.

One of the offshoot of codenxt technologies is “freshhomes properties seach ” hosted at freshhomes.in which is currently under internal beta testing & will be soon (production launched for a single city Ahmedabad in India. The site aims to be a micro geographic web media in India for the specified vertical (new properties).
